document_data.name: City Guard of Dihliz
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Dihliz]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "Gateway City".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 1,000 soldiers, 1,000 cavalry, and a navy consisting of 8 river barges.
document_data.Activities: Dihliz's forces were commanded by [[Ebu min Hassana]]. The "navy" was active only along the mighty [[Nogaro River]].
